title: Not Enough Flex Queue Players
body:
It's really hard to get a match on flex, either it's because there's not a lot of people playing flex or there's not enough people for me to match with, really sucks waiting for 10+/20+ minutes every time even at peak hours.

Hope Riot OCE can find a solution for this.

replies.body:
Flex is probably going to be very quiet for a while people are focusing on soloq placements, early season climb and the long waited return of ARURF. 

It will hopefully pick up in a month once the excitement of season start has died down.
Hope that's the case, I actually want to get a flex rank so I can just keep focusing on soloq on the long run.
